ai-mil7.3.10:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the five factors should be calmed up by the recitation?”
ai-mil7.3.10:1.2_0: “Just as the great ocean does not live with a dead corpse,
ai-mil7.3.10:1.3_0: In the same way, when a meditator is engaged in malicious talebearing by greed, hate, delusion, anger, hostility, disdain, contempt, jealousy, stinginess, deviousness, and deceitfulness.
ai-mil7.3.10:1.4_0: This is the first way to get a battle.
ai-mil7.3.10:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the ocean slips and crystals, with trade of gold coins and leaves, and nostrils shops and crystals.
ai-mil7.3.10:2.2_0: In the same way, a meditator with good qualities can precious about the fruit of stream-entry that is considered gems and liberations, immersion due to the emerging from the surmounting of the fruit of knowledge and freedom.
ai-mil7.3.10:2.3_0: this is the second great king.
ai-mil7.3.10:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the great ocean together with the great earth is a hundred and fifty great primaries.
ai-mil7.3.10:3.2_0: In the same way, a meditator with few wishes, contentment, self-mortification, having few wishes, contentment, effacement, seclusion, keeping your spiritual companions, unbroken, impeccable, spotless, and unmarred—to say.
ai-mil7.3.10:3.3_0: This is the third way to get hold of the ocean.
ai-mil7.3.10:4.1_0: Furthermore, the ocean is full of impurities and rains on the banks of the Ganges river. It’s not easy to fill up the waters, full to the sky. And it doesn’t swept away down in the sky.
ai-mil7.3.10:4.2_0: In the same way, great king, anyone who enjoys possessions, honor, and popularity would not be able to take his life when they wish.
ai-mil7.3.10:4.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.3.10:5.1_0: ‘The ocean is consistent and doesn’t overflow its boundaries.
ai-mil7.3.10:5.2_0: In the same way, when a training rule is laid down for my disciples they wouldn’t break it even for the sake of their own life.’
ai-mil7.3.10:6.1_0: Furthermore, the ocean drops and rains on the Ganges river. It doesn’t drop off the water in the Ganges river, or the water in the ocean.
ai-mil7.3.10:6.2_0: In the same way, great king, the one who indicates the recitation passage and analysis of recitation passage and analysis of the training rules—don’t listen to the Monastic Law or properly resolved in the Monastic Code.
ai-mil7.3.10:6.4_0: The Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil7.3.10:7.3_0: Even if an astute person says,
ai-mil7.3.10:7.4_0: Having heard it was not well spoken?”
ai-mil7.3.10:8.1_0: The tenth enquiry is the tenth.
ai-mil7.3.10:9.1_0: The second sub-chapter on the ocean is finished.
ai-mil7.3.10:11.5_0: The ocean is excellent and the ocean.
